imdb.title: Kenzen Robo Daimidaler
imdb.plot: Madanbashi Kouichi, a high school boy who can emit Hi-ERO particles by doing perverted things, is chosen to operate the robotic weapon Daimidaler, as Earth receives threats from the Penguin Empire.

episodes.title: Fondle! Daimidaler Goes into Action!
episodes.plot: The creators of High School DxD bring you a ridiculously raunchy romp through a world filled with mechs powered by perversion! The earth is under attack by the alien Penguin Empire and only heroes able to produce Hi-Ero particles need apply. Piloting the Daimidaler mechs are master pervert Kouichi with his take-no-prisoners libido and Kiriko, a girl who can level cities just by thinking of her boyfriend. It's up to them to dodge the massive front tails of the filthy penguin commandos and go toe to toe with rival mechs powered by a girl who loves penguins a little too ...

episodes.title: Danger! The Stolen Sun
episodes.plot: Unable to reproduce the original burst of Hi-ERO particles, Kouichi must discover the true power of Eros to defeat his new enemy, Antarctic Number 9!

episodes.title: Menace! Fiery Jake Appears
episodes.plot: A mysterious girl who loves penguins suddenly appears within the Penguin Empire. At the same time, Kouichi must become worthy to pilot Daimidaler.

episodes.title: Challenge from Six
episodes.plot: The Penguin Empire finally succeed infusing a penguin with Hi-ERO particles and Kyoko meets a mysterious and handsome stranger with no memories.

episodes.title: Mad Dance! The Fearsome Penguin Flyers
episodes.plot: A new robot, the Ritz Custom, appears after the Emperor discovers the secrets of Daimidaler. Will Kouichi be able to survive such a powerful foe?

episodes.title: Arrival! Shouma and Kiriko
episodes.plot: With Kouichi out of the picture, a new main character arrives. The Penguin Empire has almost grasped complete victory. Now, Kiriko must fall in love.

episodes.title: Hurrah! Antarctic Number 11 Appears
episodes.plot: Kiriko and Shouma must work together to take down Antarctic Number 11, but Shouma refuses to touch Kiriko anymore. He must find another way!

episodes.title: Convenient! Electric Toothbrush
episodes.plot: As Ritz and the others walk back to Penguin Castle, the Emperor continues testing the penguin particle device. Kiriko and Ritz face off, woman to woman!

episodes.title: Warning! The Closed Gate
episodes.plot: While dreaming of Ritz's past, we find out how far her penguin family is willing to go for her. They must put the Super Antarctic to good use!

episodes.title: Invoke! Joseph's Symbol
episodes.plot: As Kyoko's eyes begin to open, Kiriko's most valuable possession is taken away. Kiriko unleashes an attack against Ritz and the city behind her.

episodes.title: Distraction! The Emperor's Sexual Harassment
episodes.plot: Madanbashi Kouichi is back, and he's stronger than ever. Together, he and Kyoko are back in action, but what's the deal with Daimidaler's new upgrade?

episodes.title: Showdown! Sound Robots vs Daimidaler
episodes.plot: The final battle has begun. Now Beauty Salon Prince must partner with the Penguin Empire to defeat a whole new enemy?! Stand up and fight, Daimidaler!
